homepage.description: Welcome to Jane Total Wellness app, we are working hard to bring the best experience possible for you and your journey to a healthy body, mind and soul.

Client.InfoUpdate: Your profile has been successfully updated.
Client.ApproxBMI: Approximate BMI will be automatically calculated
Client.NoteLegend: Express your feelings and reactions about the interaction, performance or general thoughts about my sessions with this client.
Client.NoNotes: There are no notes posted in this clients history

EditForm.ImageSaved: Your profile photo has been successfully updated
EditForm.InfoUpdate: Your health information has been successfully updated
EditForm.PasswordUpdate: Your password has been successfully updated, new password will be valid next time you login
EditForm.ProfileDeleted: We are sad to see you go, keep yourself active and healthy
EditForm.ProfileLegend: This information will be shown only to the admins.
EditForm.HealthLegend: Medical background, chronic health issues, treatments, etc. If you have any doctor's certificate please share it with me in person.
EditForm.AddressLegend: Use an address where you live most of the year.
EditForm.PasswordLegend: We recommend you to change your password at least twice a year
EditForm.EraseLegend: Please make that you really need or want your profile to be removed, all the data will be lost after doing so and cannot be recovered.
EditForm.RemovingConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove your account? All of your data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.

Signin.SessionWelcome: , your session will automatically expire in 30 minutes

Signup.AcceptTerms: Please accept terms and conditions in order to sign up
Signup.UsedUsername: has been used, try with a different username
Signup.UsedEmail: is already in our database, try with a different email
Signup.BgndPlaceholder: Sports or physical activities done in the past, if none simply write 'No background'
Signup.GoalsPlaceholder: Tell me why you are seeking for my help

WarningModal.Title: Session expiration warning
WarningModal.Message: You have been logged in for more than 30 minutes and your session has expired, please sign in again

Blog.Author: Author:
Blog.Instructions: You will see your blog here once your start typing
Blog.Name: Name
Blog.Title: Title:
Blog.Posted: Your blog post has been published
Blog.Deleted: The blog post has been deleted
